ing.item: Cooked dried or canned apricots; sieved

directions.step:
Roll wafers into crumbs. Pack crumbs on bottom of 8- or 9-inch square pan, reserving 1/2 cup for top. Cream butter & sugar, add well beaten egg yolks & mix well. Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites. Pour over crumbs. Spread apricots on top. Cover with cream & sprinkle with remaining crumbs. Refrigerate at least 12 hours. Cut in squares to serve.
MRS JOHN T. (HARRIET) EVANS
